original_text: “‘So beginning with the fifteenth day of the seventh month, after you have gathered the crops of the land, celebrate the festival to the Lord for seven days; the first day is a day of sabbath rest, and the eighth day also is a day of sabbath rest.
korean_text: 너희가 토지 소산 거두기를 마치거든 일곱째 달 열닷샛날부터 이레 동안 여호와의 절기를 지키되 첫 날에도 안식하고 여덟째 날에도 안식할 것이요

sentences.original_text: So beginning with the fifteenth day of the seventh month,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 일곱째 달 열다섯째 날부터 시작하여,

sentences.original_text: after you have gathered the crops of the land,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 땅의 곡물을 거두어 들인 후에,

sentences.original_text: celebrate the festival to the Lord for seven days;
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안 주를 위하여 절기를 지내고,

sentences.original_text: the first day is a day of sabbath rest,
and the eighth day also is a day of sabbath rest.
